refnamediv.refpurpose: Cartesian co-ordinates of points defined by rho and theta pairs.

listitem.para: vector of values of theta that represent the input line
vector of values of theta that represent the input line
It is an MX4 matrix containing the points of intersection of the line(represented by rho and theta) with the image boundary.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The function returns the points of intersection of the line defined by rho and theta pairs with the image boundary. Image boundary refers to the left and right vertical boundary and top and bottom horizontal boundary.
